subject: Question about products
description_text:
Hello,
I am intending on buying your 3 pedal set and getting 1 vam and 1 vam pro
so I just wanted to know do I need the power supply if I'm plugging in the
haptics to the pedal controller
Kind regards
Dominik

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominik Lelas,    Yes, using haptics requires connecting an additional power supply.
